name: Mini Pumpkin Muffins with Orange Drizzle
author: USA WEEKEND Pam Anderson
summary: Spiced pumpkin and a tangy, orange drizzle roll the flavors of fall into a warm little muffin.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon finely grated orange zest
directions: Adjust oven rack to center position and heat oven to 425 degrees
Spray 36 mini-muffin cups with vegetable cooking spray
Bring pumpkin, ginger, cinnamon and cloves to a simmer in a medium saucepan until puree thickens enough to start sticking to pan bottom, 6 to 8 minutes
Turn hot puree into a bowl
Whisk in brown sugar and oil, then slowly beat in eggs
Meanwhile, whisk the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl; whisk into pumpkin mixture until just combined
Divide batter among the muffin cups and bake until golden and cooked through, about 10 minutes
Let stand a few minutes, then transfer mini-muffins to a wire rack to cool
Mix the drizzle ingredients together and drizzle over warm muffins
